001// Copyright (c) Choreo contributors
002
003package choreo.util;
004
005import edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Pose2d;
006import edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Pose3d;
007import edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Rotation2d;
008import edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Rotation3d;
009import edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Translation2d;
010import edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Translation3d;
011import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.DriverStation;
012import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.DriverStation.Alliance;
013import java.util.HashMap;
014import java.util.Optional;
015import java.util.function.BooleanSupplier;
016import java.util.function.Supplier;
017
018/**
019 * A utility to standardize flipping of coordinate data based on the current alliance across
020 * different years.
021 *
022 * <p>If every vendor used this, the user would be able to specify the year and no matter the year
023 * the vendor's code is from, the user would be able to flip as expected.
024 *
025 * <p>This API still allows vendors and users to match case against the flipping variant as a way to
026 * specially handle cases or throw errors if a variant is explicitly not supported.
027 */
028public class AllianceFlipUtil {
029  /** The flipper to use for flipping coordinates. */
030  public static enum Flipper {
031    /**
032     * X becomes fieldLength - x, leaves the y coordinate unchanged, and heading becomes PI -
033     * heading.
034     */
035    MIRRORED {
036      public double flipX(double x) {
037        return activeYear.fieldLength - x;
038      }
039
040      public double flipY(double y) {
041        return y;
042      }
043
044      public double flipHeading(double heading) {
045        return Math.PI - heading;
046      }
047    },
048    /** X becomes fieldLength - x, Y becomes fieldWidth - y, and heading becomes PI - heading. */
049    ROTATE_AROUND {
050      public double flipX(double x) {
051        return activeYear.fieldLength - x;
052      }
053
054      public double flipY(double y) {
055        return activeYear.fieldWidth - y;
056      }
057
058      public double flipHeading(double heading) {
059        return Math.PI - heading;
060      }
061    };
062
063    /**
064     * Flips the X coordinate.
065     *
066     * @param x The X coordinate to flip.
067     * @return The flipped X coordinate.
068     */
069    public abstract double flipX(double x);
070
071    /**
072     * Flips the Y coordinate.
073     *
074     * @param y The Y coordinate to flip.
075     * @return The flipped Y coordinate.
076     */
077    public abstract double flipY(double y);
078
079    /**
080     * Flips the heading.
081     *
082     * @param heading The heading to flip.
083     * @return The flipped heading.
084     */
085    public abstract double flipHeading(double heading);
086  }
087
088  private static record YearInfo(Flipper flipper, double fieldLength, double fieldWidth) {}
089
090  // TODO: Update and expand this map
091  private static final HashMap<Integer, YearInfo> flipperMap =
092      new HashMap<Integer, YearInfo>() {
093        {
094          put(2020, new YearInfo(Flipper.ROTATE_AROUND, 16.5811, 8.19912));
095          put(2021, new YearInfo(Flipper.ROTATE_AROUND, 16.5811, 8.19912));
096          put(2022, new YearInfo(Flipper.ROTATE_AROUND, 16.5811, 8.19912));
097          put(2023, new YearInfo(Flipper.MIRRORED, 16.5811, 8.19912));
098          put(2024, new YearInfo(Flipper.MIRRORED, 16.5811, 8.19912));
099        }
100      };
101
102  private static YearInfo activeYear = flipperMap.get(2024);
103
104  /** Default constructor. */
105  private AllianceFlipUtil() {}
106
107  /**
108   * Get the flipper that is currently active for flipping coordinates. It's recommended not to
109   * store this locally as the flipper may change.
110   *
111   * @return The active flipper.
112   */
113  public static Flipper getFlipper() {
114    return activeYear.flipper;
115  }
116
117  /**
118   * Returns if you are on red alliance.
119   *
120   * @return If you are on red alliance.
121   */
122  public static boolean shouldFlip() {
123    return DriverStation.getAlliance().orElse(Alliance.Blue) == Alliance.Red;
124  }
125
126  /**
127   * Set the year to determine the Alliance Coordinate Flipper to use.
128   *
129   * @param year The year to set the flipper to. [2020 - 2024]
130   */
131  public static void setYear(int year) {
132    if (!flipperMap.containsKey(year)) {
133      throw new IllegalArgumentException("Year " + year + " is not supported.");
134    }
135    activeYear = flipperMap.get(year);
136  }
137
138  /**
139   * Flips the X coordinate.
140   *
141   * @param x The X coordinate to flip.
142   * @return The flipped X coordinate.
143   */
144  public static double flipX(double x) {
145    return activeYear.flipper.flipX(x);
146  }
147
148  /**
149   * Flips the Y coordinate.
150   *
151   * @param y The Y coordinate to flip.
152   * @return The flipped Y coordinate.
153   */
154  public static double flipY(double y) {
155    return activeYear.flipper.flipY(y);
156  }
157
158  /**
159   * Flips the heading.
160   *
161   * @param heading The heading to flip.
162   * @return The flipped heading.
163   */
164  public static double flipHeading(double heading) {
165    return activeYear.flipper.flipHeading(heading);
166  }
167
168  /**
169   * Flips the translation.
170   *
171   * @param translation The translation to flip.
172   * @return The flipped translation.
173   */
174  public static Translation2d flip(Translation2d translation) {
175    return new Translation2d(flipX(translation.getX()), flipY(translation.getY()));
176  }
177
178  /**
179   * Flips the rotation.
180   *
181   * @param rotation The rotation to flip.
182   * @return The flipped rotation.
183   */
184  public static Rotation2d flip(Rotation2d rotation) {
185    return switch (activeYear.flipper) {
186      case MIRRORED -> new Rotation2d(-rotation.getCos(), rotation.getSin());
187      case ROTATE_AROUND -> new Rotation2d(-rotation.getCos(), -rotation.getSin());
188    };
189  }
190
191  /**
192   * Flips the pose.
193   *
194   * @param pose The pose to flip.
195   * @return The flipped pose.
196   */
197  public static Pose2d flip(Pose2d pose) {
198    return new Pose2d(flip(pose.getTranslation()), flip(pose.getRotation()));
199  }
200
201  /**
202   * Flips the translation.
203   *
204   * @param translation The translation to flip.
205   * @return The flipped translation.
206   */
207  public static Translation3d flip(Translation3d translation) {
208    return new Translation3d(
209        flipX(translation.getX()), flipY(translation.getY()), translation.getZ());
210  }
211
212  /**
213   * Flips the rotation.
214   *
215   * @param rotation The rotation to flip.
216   * @return The flipped rotation.
217   */
218  public static Rotation3d flip(Rotation3d rotation) {
219    return new Rotation3d(
220        rotation.getX(), rotation.getY(), flip(rotation.toRotation2d()).getRadians());
221  }
222
223  /**
224   * Flips the pose.
225   *
226   * @param pose The pose to flip.
227   * @return The flipped pose.
228   */
229  public static Pose3d flip(Pose3d pose) {
230    return new Pose3d(flip(pose.getTranslation()), flip(pose.getRotation()));
231  }
232
233  /**
234   * Creates a Supplier&lt;Optional&lt;Pose2d&gt;&gt; based on a
235   * Supplier&lt;Optional&lt;Alliance&gt;&gt; and original Optional&lt;Pose2d&gt;
236   *
237   * @param poseOpt The pose to flip
238   * @param allianceOpt The current alliance
239   * @param doFlip Returns true if flipping based on the alliance should be done
240   * @return empty if the alliance is empty; the original pose optional if the alliance is blue or
241   *     doFlip is false; the flipped pose optional if the alliance is red and doFlip is true
242   */
243  public static Supplier<Optional<Pose2d>> optionalFlippedPose2d(
244      Optional<Pose2d> poseOpt, Supplier<Optional<Alliance>> allianceOpt, BooleanSupplier doFlip) {
245    return () ->
246        doFlip.getAsBoolean()
247            ? allianceOpt
248                .get()
249                .flatMap(ally -> poseOpt.map(pose -> ally == Alliance.Red ? flip(pose) : pose))
250            : poseOpt;
251  }
252
253  /**
254   * Creates a Supplier&lt;Optional&lt;Translation2d&gt;&gt; that is flipped based on a
255   * Supplier&lt;Optional&lt;Alliance&gt;&gt; and original Optional&lt;Translation2d&gt;
256   *
257   * @param translationOpt The translation to flip
258   * @param allianceOpt The current alliance
259   * @param doFlip Returns true if flipping based on the alliance should be done
260   * @return empty if the alliance is empty; the original translation optional if the alliance is
261   *     blue or doFlip is false; the flipped translation optional if the alliance is red and doFlip
262   *     is true
263   */
264  public static Supplier<Optional<Translation2d>> optionalFlippedTranslation2d(
265      Optional<Translation2d> translationOpt,
266      Supplier<Optional<Alliance>> allianceOpt,
267      BooleanSupplier doFlip) {
268    return () ->
269        doFlip.getAsBoolean()
270            ? allianceOpt
271                .get()
272                .flatMap(
273                    ally ->
274                        translationOpt.map(
275                            translation -> ally == Alliance.Red ? flip(translation) : translation))
276            : translationOpt;
277  }
278}
